name: Simulacrum (Herbalrage)
description:
Created for the ScoreSpace #16 GameJam (https://itch.io/jam/scorejam16)

An old age mage escape, one clone at a time.

Use your powerful spells to reign devastation on all those who tread your dying path toward lichdom!

With your last remaining 30 seconds on Earth, prolong your precious life long enough to seek the phylactery you so longed for. Achieve eternal life.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Meteor Strike - R, then left click

Dash - Left Shift

Simulacrum (Clone) - Q

(Pressing Escape skips the introduction cutscene!)

                         

/ / / / / / / / Credits / / / / / / / / / /
